summary: This is an email dated March 5, 2021, from an unidentified sender to an unidentified recipient, forwarding a document titled 'PC Unit -- Short Form Update.3.5.21.docx' related to the Public Corruption Unit of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. The email indicates the sender has completed most of the tasks and leaves some for the recipient.
keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 5, 2021, concerning the Public Corruption Unit (PC Unit).
The email references an attached document titled 'PC Unit -- Short Form Update.3.5.21.docx'.
The correspondence originates from or is directed to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text; all parties appear to be redacted or referred to by title only.
The content suggests an internal update or task delegation within the Public Corruption Unit.
